findings.title: Due to Strategy logic, auction may not work properly
findings.description: The auction functionality may malfunction due to flaws in the strategy logic.

findings.title: TokenFactory Address Mismatch
findings.description: When the factory address differs from the owner address, TokenFactory contract cannot distribute NFT721 and NFT1155.

findings.title: Absence of IERC721#onERC721Received() Function Implementation
findings.description: The auction is not performed normally due to the absence of IERC721#onERC721Received() function implementation, causing NFT transmissions to fail and Governance Token creation to be impossible.

findings.title: Absence of IERC1271#isValidSignature() Function Implementation
findings.description: The auction is not performed normally due to the absence of IERC1271#isValidSignature() function implementation.

findings.title: Anyone can issue NFTs using Factory Contract
findings.description: For NFT tokens distributed by TokenFactory, anyone can call mintWithTags721() and mintWithTags1155() functions to issue as many NFTs as they want.

findings.title: Unauthorized NFT Minting
findings.description: Anyone can issue as many NFTs as they want by calling TokenFactory#mintWithTags721() or TokenFactory#mintWithTags1155() functions because there is no check on who can mint via modifier or signature.
